channel.title: Help With Client Compiler error
channel.description:
Ok so i thought i would try moparscape over another website wont let me put name because i cant get anyhelp on that so can some help me When i compile i get thise error
Gui.java:1255: cannot find symbol symbol : variable HPBarToggle location: class Gui HPBarToggle = true; ^ Gui.java:1260: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable HPBarToggle location: class Gui HPBarToggle = false; Ok so how i declare it its in the client.java? where do i add it

item.title: Help With Client Compiler error
item.dc:creator: @Oh-Noes Oh-Noes
item.description:
@Oh-Noes wrote:

Just declare:

public boolean HPBarToggle;

Read full topic

item.title: Help With Client Compiler error
item.dc:creator: @XxBryantD XxBryantD
item.description:
@XxBryantD wrote:

Ok so i thought i would try moparscape over another website wont let me put name because i cant get anyhelp on that so can some help me
When i compile i get thise error

Gui.java:1255: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable HPBarToggle
location: class Gui
HPBarToggle = true;
^
Gui.java:1260: cannot find symbol

symbol : variable HPBarToggle
location: class Gui
HPBarToggle = false;
Ok so how i declare it its in the client.java? where do i add it

Read full topic
